revised_title: Corrigendum: Distribution of Vitamin B1 and Nitrogen in the Wheat Grain
tldr: This article discusses the distribution of vitamin B1 and nitrogen in the wheat grain. It finds that 62% of the total vitamin B1 is present in the scutellum and 32% in the aleurone layer. The author also corrects a mistake in a previous publication.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Nutrition and Metabolism
